title: Xmas present for my best friend
body:
Check out what I was able to get finished for my best friend for Xmas.  Its a little late but I think it turned out well.  

http://s1233.photobucket.com/user/zyorhist/media/CYqFadwUoAEU-B2.jpg.html

Edit: Its wood burned onto the plaque and oil penciled over that.  I still need to put a gloss finish on it, but wanted to show it off before finishing it up and putting it into the mail.

replies.body: This is incredible! Job well done. Your friend is going to love this!
